Add CORS-headers middleware

Source: R/utils.R
cors.Rd

Add Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) middleware to the instance.

cors(beakr, path = NULL, with_methods = c("POST", "GET", "PUT",
  "OPTIONS", "DELETE", "PATCH"), with_origin = "*",
  with_headers = NULL, with_credentials = NULL, max_age = NULL,
  expose_headers = NULL)

Arguments

beakr

a beakr instance.
path

a string path.
with_methods

tbd
with_origin

tbd
with_headers

tbd
with_credentials

tbd
max_age

tbd
expose_headers

tbd

Details

CORS is a mechanism that uses additional HTTP headers to tell browsers to give a web application running at one origin, access to selected resources from a different origin. A web application executes a cross-origin HTTP request when it requests a resource that has a different origin (domain, protocol, or port) from its own.

Additional Info: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Access_control_CORS
